Desc.eng: We managed to hold our ground! But only just. Harker is now familiar with our positions. My scouts tell me that the General is preparing a full-scale artillery attack. I’d recommend that we send our men back to the second line of defense.
What would you like me to do?
Patience, commander. I have to take care of something first.
Call back the soldiers from the first line. I go to the front line and wait there before they attack.
I’ll give the orders for the second line!
From now on you are in charge here.
Great! I’ll give the orders for the second line! Do you need anything else?
Patience, commander. I have to take care of something first.
Yes. Call back the soldiers from the first line. I go to the front line and wait there before they attack.
